fingerprint.description: Simple tnftpd banner with a version
ProFTPD on a Linksys Wireless Access Point/Router
ProFTPD on a wired Linksys device
ProFTPD with version info but no obvious OS info
Pure-FTPd versions <= 1.0.13 (at least as far back as 1.0.11)
Pure-FTPd versions >= 1.0.14 Config data can be zero or more of: [privsep] [TLS]
